name: DailyStar-SpangledBanner
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
On September 14th, 1814, after witnessing the bombardment of Fort McHenry by the British naval fleet, a young lawyer and poet, Francis Scott Key, penned what would become the National Anthem of the United States of America.

Listen now to that anthem played by the United States Marine Corp. Band!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
